sqlGroup.sql: SELECT id, name, password, salt, default_flag, birthday, create_time, username, wxchat, qq, role_id, super_admin, type FROM mo_user WHERE name = ?

SELECT mu.id, mu.username, mu.name, mu.create_time, mu.last_login_time, mu.first_login_time, mu.phone, mu.type, mu.super_admin, (select group_concat(mr.name,',') from mo_user_role mur INNER JOIN mo_role mr On mr.id = mur.role_id Where mur.user_id = ?) as roleName FROM mo_user mu LEFT JOIN mo_role mr ON mr.id = mu.role_id WHERE mu.id = ?
SELECT mu.id id, mu.name name, mu.phone phone, mu.username username, mu.birthday birthday, mu.gender gender, mu.create_time, type -- @where FROM mo_user mu -- @condition WHERE mu.name != 'admin'
